item.description:
Since all our social dinners are held in the evening, we decided to hold a social brunch in the New Haven area so that members who find evening events inconvenient can have a chance to participate. We're starting off with a highly recommended Indian restaurant in Orange. Although they have a lunch buffet, it may be possible to order off the regular menu.

For more information, see http://www.cthumanist...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the dining area
item.name: Social Brunch
